import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./YearsCounter.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const YearsCounter=_ref=>{let{startDate}=_ref;// Function to calculate precise years
const calculatePreciseYears=start=>{const now=new Date();const startDate=new Date(start);return(now.getTime()-startDate.getTime())/(1000*60*60*24*365);};const[years,setYears]=useState(calculatePreciseYears(startDate));useEffect(()=>{const updateYears=()=>{setYears(calculatePreciseYears(startDate));};// Update every day (in milliseconds)
const interval=setInterval(updateYears,1);// Clear interval on component unmount
return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[startDate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"main",children:years.toFixed(8)})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tail",children:"years old"})]});};export default YearsCounter;
